page.title: 15Attitudes Customs-My Day
page.content:
10 minute break playing ball games like Kingo,then an hour of RE.At 3.30 we start walking home telling each other what we have been doing.We get home in about 1/2 an hour and have a cup of tea I watch Inspector Gadget and Dramarama my favourite programmes.At 5pm I have my tea with beef,roast potatoes,cabbage and peas(from the day before)At 6pm I watch News Round and Northern Life with parents.In 1/2 an hour I have to get ready for Guides with my Guide hat,a blue shirt,a navy skirt,a light blue scarf,a woggle, a belt and black shoes. At 7.15,Guides starts.We play games and do things in our patrols.It finishes at 9pm.When I get home ,I have a cup of tea and a biscuit and go to bed.
Written by Katie Harris,Stonelaw Middle School
